description: JCLIC files are usually distributed using .JNLP files. When you open the JNLP file, JClic downloads the corresponding JCLIC file and then saves the activity to the JClic library. JCLIC files are often compressed and use the ".jclic.zip" file extension.
NOTE: JClic requires the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) to be installed to run. JClic itself is installed from a JNLP file, which is opened by Java Web Start to install the software.
